author: Jack Morse
title: Google and Apple team up to support coronavirus contact tracing
description: Who gave you the coronavirus, and how many people did you give it to? As a pandemic sweeps the globe, charting the course of the coronavirus is vital public health work. On Friday, Google and Apple announced a combined effort to facilitate contact tracing — t…
content:
